scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.test.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-ng && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ng.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo-ng && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-pager && cd ../demo-ng && npm link nativescript-pager && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.ng.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-ng && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.vue.ios: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && npm run watch:ios
scripts.demo.vue.android: npm i && npm run tsc && cd ../demo-vue && npm run watch:android
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && rimraf platforms && cd ../demo-ng && rimraf platforms && cd ../demo-vue && npm run clean
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-pager && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-ng && tns plugin remove nativescript-pager && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../demo-ng && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
scripts.ngc: npm i && npm run ngc.clean && node --max-old-space-size=8192 ./node_modules/.bin/ngc -p tsconfig.aot.json
